archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.4a: a) briefing individuals who may be targeted (e.g. executive management; individuals with privileged system or physical access; and remote workers) about protecting sensitive information and responding to attacks
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
